transcript.speaker: Sales Rep
transcript.text: Hi, I'm calling from ChemBuild. Do you have a moment to discuss your waterproofing needs?

transcript.speaker: Prospect
transcript.text: We are actually having trouble with the basement sealing in our new mall project.

missedOpportunities: Didn't ask about square footage immediately
coaching.summary: Solid discovery call but needs more technical qualification.
teachingMoments: Use the 'FEBA' technique for waterproofing specs.

competitors.name: Sika
competitors.context: Prospect mentioned they usually use Sika for these joints.

objections.objection: Price is too high per drum
objections.response: Explained coverage area is double the competitor, so cost per sqft is lower.

trainingSuggested.reason: Price objection handling was good but could be smoother.
